post:
Hello,
We've been around for 5+ years and own & colocate our hardware and networking gear and have our own ARIN issued IPs for our US based locations. We've recently added new SSD hardware to our Frankfurt, Germany and Amsterdam, The Netherlands location and would like to share an offer with you.

**Our Site:** https://crowncloud.net/

**Datacenter**
AcceleratedIT, Frankfurt, Germany
Test IPv4: 84.200.17.1
Test IPv6: 2a0a:51c0:0:1f::1

Equinix AM11, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
Test IPv4: 185.208.208.3
Test IPv6: 2a0b:3c40:1:103::1

Quadranet & Psychz, Los Angeles, California
Test IP Quadranet: 198.55.111.5 / 2607:fcd0:0:a::1
Test IP Psychz: 104.149.18.203

---

**SSD Plan Yearly**

1 GB RAM
20 GB SSD
1 TB Bandwidth
2 CPU cores fair share allocation
1 IPv4
1 Gbps uplink
1 Full VPS Snapshot Slot

$25/year

**Order Link:**
- Amsterdam, The Netherlands - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=357
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=382
- Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=399

---

**SSD Plan 1**
4 GB RAM
60 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$7/month or $35/semi-annual

**Order Links**
- Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=383
- Amsterdam, The Netherlands - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=412
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=376

---

**SSD Plan 2**
2 GB RAM
30 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$5/month or $25/semi-annual

**Order Links**
- Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=347
- Amsterdam, The Netherlands - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=398
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=285

---

**Operating systems:**
We've got 1-click install templates for CentOS 6/7/8, Debian 8/9/10, various Ubuntu(s) upto 20.04, Windows 2012/2016.
Also do note, We do not provide licenses for Windows, the customer is responsible for the license on the machine.

**Other information**
1. SSH Key insert during install support is included
2. In-control panel rDNS support is included
3. Custom ISOs can be requested to be mounted onto your VPS for free as well via ticket.
4. Labels can be setup on VPSes (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?How_to_set_a_label_on_a_VPS_in_CrownPanel)
5. 2Factor Authentication available in billing/client-area and VPS control panel (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?2factor_authentication_in_crownpanel)
6. **NEW** Name can be setup on a snapshot (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?How_to_Add_Name_to_Snapshots_in_CrownPanel)
